doc.title: Arrival of Humpty Dumpty
doc.plot: The following films were made from the great pantomime Humpty Dumpty, and were posed for by one of the greatest European Pantomimist. These films are without doubt the finest ever made and will create no end of amusement to the little folks as well as the old folks, who in these films will recognize the familiar scenes of their childhood when they witnessed Humpty Dumpty.
